snippet: After struggling for much of his Olympic singles quarterfinal against a Brazilian opponent backed by a raucous home crowd, Rafael Nadal finally seized control by using a big backhand to set up an easy putaway at the net for a third-set service bre...
lead_paragraph: After struggling for much of his Olympic singles quarterfinal against a Brazilian opponent backed by a raucous home crowd, Rafael Nadal finally seized control by using a big backhand to set up an easy putaway at the net for a third-set service break.

headline.print_headline: Close Calls! Nadal, Murray Both Squeak Into Olympic Semis
headline.main: Close Calls! Nadal, Murray Both Squeak Into Olympic Semis
